info.author: Gabriel S. Cabrera
info.name: BanterBot
info.summary: BanterBot: An OpenAI ChatGPT-powered chatbot with Azure Neural Voices. Supports speech-to-text and text-to-speech interactions with emotional tone selection. Features real-time monitoring and Tkinter frontend.
